rows.label: qst103312_msg001
rows.name: She was dead when I arrived (temp)

rows.label: qst103312_msg101
rows.name: How dreadful (temp)

rows.label: qst103312_msg201
rows.name: To think she was a senator (temp)

rows.label: qst103312_msg0001
rows.name:
Well, well, Special Inquisitor
Meleph. What can I do for you?

rows.label: qst103312_msg0002
rows.name:
Senator Saman Aramiatt has been
murdered by an unknown assailant.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0003
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]My wife?!

rows.label: qst103312_msg0004
rows.name: That can't be... You must be joking.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0005
rows.name:
No... You are not one
to make such jokes.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0006
rows.name: Saman... Why...

rows.label: qst103312_msg0007
rows.name:
Do you know of anyone who might
hold a grudge against her?

rows.label: qst103312_msg0008
rows.name:
My wife was very sincere... It's
unthinkable that anyone would
hold a grudge against her.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0009
rows.name:
...If there were any, it would be
those with anti-imperial sentiments.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0010
rows.name:
It is difficult to say this before
you, Special Inquisitor Meleph...

rows.label: qst103312_msg0011
rows.name:
But there are not a few who are dissatisfied
with the current regime and engage in
aggressive activities rather than debate.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0012
rows.name:
Recently, their movements have
become more organized, and they are
beginning to be seen as a threat.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0013
rows.name:
My wife was preparing to submit a
proposal to the council to strengthen
the crackdown on such organizations...

rows.label: qst103312_msg0014
rows.name: To think it would come to this...

rows.label: qst103312_msg0015
rows.name: Where was my wife...

rows.label: qst103312_msg0016
rows.name:
That place was my wife's favorite.
She always went without a guard.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0017
rows.name:
The only people who knew that were...
me and her secretary, Karaya.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0018
rows.name: Karaya! Is Karaya here?

rows.label: qst103312_msg0019
rows.name:
Karaya! Are you not here?
Usually, he comes right away...

rows.label: qst103312_msg0020
rows.name: Could it be... Karaya...?!

rows.label: qst103312_msg0021
rows.name:
Senator Saman Aramiatt's body has
been taken to military headquarters.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0022
rows.name: Please go and retrieve it.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0023
rows.name:
We will investigate the
matter of the secretary.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0024
rows.name: ...Yes.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0025
rows.name:
Ah... what will I tell the
children...? They are still so young!

rows.label: qst103312_msg0026
rows.name: Shamayim Hot Springs?!
